sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import pictureNotLoggedIn from '../assets/reward-selector-sign-in.svg' class RewardSelector extends Component { rewardDescriptionHelper = (reward) => { switch (reward) { case "RewFD": return "Free Drink" case "Rew10": return "10% Off" case "Rew20": return "20% Off" case "Rew25": return "25% Off" case "Rew50": return "50% Off" case "Rew75": return "75% Off" case "Rew100": return "100% Off" case "RewFM": return "Free Meal" default: return "" } } render () { const { user } = this.props if ( this.props.userLoggedIn){ return(

Choose your Rewards

Avaliable Credits: {user.points}

35 credits
50 credits
75 credits
125 credits
250 credits
) } else { return(

Sign up or log in to acccess Rewards

) } } } export default RewardSelector
